item.title: Reinvention of 007 + Back to the future = Really dumb idea
item.description: Update Some nice digg user decided to comment and inform me that this was the FIRST Bond book. Basically Bond before the toys. hmm, nope, still don’t like the idea. **Ok. I’m pissed. ** Let me get this straight. You’ve got A legendary name (“James Bond”) A multi-million dollar market A slew of Hollywood stars that have made 007 great Fan clubs spanning the globe MILLIONS OF DEDICATED 007 FANS
